landing.heroDescription: A collection of free tools to help you manage your store efficiently and professionally
landing.toolsDescription: Choose from a variety of tools designed to help you succeed

profitMarginCalculator.title: Profit Margin Calculator
profitMarginCalculator.description: Calculate profit margin and markup easily

seo.whatIs: What is a Profit Margin Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: A profit margin calculator is a free tool that helps e-commerce store owners calculate profit margins and markup percentages accurately. Designed specifically for traders, marketers, and small business owners to determine appropriate prices and increase profits.
seo.formulaContent: The calculator uses two key formulas: Profit = Selling Price - Cost Price. Profit Margin (%) = (Profit ÷ Selling Price) × 100. Markup (%) = (Profit ÷ Cost Price) × 100. For example, if you buy a product for $20 and sell it for $30: Profit = $10, Profit Margin = 33.33%, Markup = 50%. Note that margin and markup are different - margin is based on selling price while markup is based on cost price.
seo.whyNeed: Why do you need this tool?
seo.whyNeedContent: Pricing products correctly is the key to any store's success. This tool helps you: determine competitive prices, ensure healthy profit margins, compare different products, and make informed financial decisions to increase your store's profits.
seo.howItWorksContent: The calculator uses precise mathematical formulas: Profit Margin = ((Selling Price - Cost) / Selling Price) × 100. And Markup = ((Selling Price - Cost) / Cost) × 100. This ensures accurate calculations for making correct pricing decisions.

faq.a1: Profit margin is the percentage of profit from the selling price, while markup is the percentage of profit from the cost.
faq.a2: Yes, you can save your calculations after creating a free account and access them from any device.
faq.q1: What's the difference between profit margin and markup?

netProfitCalculator.title: Net Profit Calculator (After Returns)
netProfitCalculator.description: Calculate your real profit after deducting return costs and processing fees
netProfitCalculator.highReturnWarning: Warning: Return rate is very high (over 50%)!

seo.whatIs: What is the Net Profit Calculator (After Returns)?
seo.whatIsContent: The Net Profit Calculator (After Returns) is an essential tool for every e-commerce merchant who wants to know their actual profits. In the world of e-commerce, returns are an integral part of business, and ignoring their costs leads to inaccurate profit estimates. This tool helps you calculate your true net profit after accounting for return rates and processing costs, giving you a clear and realistic picture of your store's financial performance.
seo.formulaContent: The formula used: Net Profit = Revenue × (1 - Return Rate) - Product Cost - (Revenue × Return Rate × Processing Cost). For example, if your revenue is $10,000, product cost is $6,000, return rate is 15%, and processing cost per return is $50, then your net profit = 10,000 × 0.85 - 6,000 - (10,000 × 0.15 × 50) = 8,500 - 6,000 - 750 = $1,750.
seo.whyNeedContent: Returns are the hidden cost that most merchants ignore when calculating their profits. Without accounting for return costs, you might think you're making good profits while in reality your losses could be significant. This tool helps you: determine the right price for your products, know the maximum acceptable return rate, make informed decisions about your return policy, and improve your actual profit margin.

paymentGatewayCalculator.title: Payment Gateway Fee Calculator
paymentGatewayCalculator.description: Calculate and compare fees for local payment gateways (Tab, Paytabs, Moyasar, HyperPay)
paymentGatewayCalculator.comparisonDescription: Compare fees across all providers for the same transaction

seo.whatIs: What is the Payment Gateway Fee Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Payment Gateway Fee Calculator is an essential tool for Saudi and Gulf merchants who want to understand the true cost of accepting online payments. With multiple payment providers available in the region including Tab, Paytabs, Moyasar, and HyperPay, each with different fee structures, it can be challenging to determine which provider offers the best rates for your business. This calculator helps you instantly compare fees across all major providers and payment methods including Mada, Visa/Mastercard, and Apple Pay.
seo.formulaContent: Payment gateway fees typically consist of a percentage fee plus a fixed fee per transaction. The formula is: Fee = (Transaction Amount × Percentage Rate) + Fixed Fee. For example, with a 1000 SAR transaction using Mada on Tab (1.5% + 0 SAR fixed), the fee would be: 1000 × 0.015 + 0 = 15 SAR. Different providers and payment methods have varying rates, with Mada typically being the cheapest option for local transactions.
seo.whyNeedContent: Understanding payment gateway fees is crucial for pricing your products correctly and maximizing profits. Many merchants overlook these fees when setting prices, leading to lower margins than expected. This tool helps you: compare all major Saudi payment providers side by side, choose the most cost-effective provider for your transaction volume, factor payment fees into your product pricing strategy, and make informed decisions about which payment methods to offer your customers.

importDutyEstimator.title: Import Duty & Tax Estimator
importDutyEstimator.description: Calculate customs duties, VAT, and total landed cost for imports
importDutyEstimator.breakdownDescription: Detailed breakdown of all costs and fees

seo.whatIs: What is the Import Duty & Tax Estimator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Import Duty & Tax Estimator is an essential tool for every importer who wants to know the true cost of importing products. When importing goods, the cost is not limited to the product price alone, but also includes shipping costs, insurance, customs duties, and VAT. This tool helps you calculate all these costs in advance to determine the appropriate price for your products and ensure you achieve the desired profit margin.
seo.formulaContent: The calculation is done in several stages: First, calculate CIF value = Product Value (FOB) + Shipping Cost + Insurance Cost. Second, calculate Customs Duty = CIF Value × Duty Rate. Third, calculate VAT = (CIF Value + Customs Duty) × VAT Rate. Finally, Total Landed Cost = CIF Value + Customs Duty + VAT. For example, for a product worth 1000 SAR with 200 SAR shipping and 50 SAR insurance to Saudi Arabia (5% duty, 15% VAT): CIF = 1250, Duty = 62.5, VAT = 196.88, Total = 1509.38 SAR.
seo.whyNeedContent: Knowing the total cost of importing is vital for the success of any business that relies on imports. Without accurate calculation of all costs, you may find yourself selling at a loss or with a lower profit margin than expected. This tool helps you: determine the appropriate selling price for your imported products, compare import costs between different countries, plan finances accurately for import operations, and avoid unpleasant surprises when the shipment arrives.

paypalFeeCalculator.title: PayPal Fee Calculator
paypalFeeCalculator.description: Calculate PayPal fees for international transactions with 2026 fee structure
paypalFeeCalculator.conversionNotice: Currency conversion will incur an additional {rate}% fee

seo.whatIs: What is the PayPal Fee Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The PayPal Fee Calculator is an essential tool for international sellers and freelancers who receive payments through PayPal. PayPal charges different fees based on transaction type, currency, and whether currency conversion is involved. Understanding these fees is crucial for pricing your services correctly and knowing exactly how much you'll receive after all deductions. This calculator uses the 2026 PayPal fee structure to give you accurate estimates.
seo.formulaContent: PayPal fees consist of two components: a percentage fee and a fixed fee. The formula is: PayPal Fee = (Amount × Percentage Rate) + Fixed Fee. For Goods & Services transactions, the rate is typically 3.49% + fixed fee (varies by currency). If currency conversion is needed, an additional 4% conversion fee applies. For example, receiving $100 USD as Goods & Services: Fee = (100 × 0.0349) + 0.49 = $3.98. If converting to SAR, add 4% conversion fee: $4.00, making total fees $7.98.
seo.whyNeedContent: PayPal fees can significantly impact your earnings, especially for international transactions with currency conversion. Many sellers underestimate these costs when pricing their products or services. This tool helps you: calculate exact fees before accepting payments, factor PayPal costs into your pricing strategy, compare costs between different currencies, understand the true cost of international transactions, and make informed decisions about payment methods to offer customers.

adBreakEvenCalculator.title: Ad Campaign Break-Even Calculator
adBreakEvenCalculator.description: Calculate break-even point, required traffic, and maximum CPC for your ad campaigns
adBreakEvenCalculator.notViableWarning: Warning: Product cost exceeds selling price. This product is not profitable!

seo.whatIs: What is the Ad Campaign Break-Even Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Ad Campaign Break-Even Calculator is an essential tool for every marketer and e-commerce seller who wants to run profitable advertising campaigns. Before spending money on ads, you need to know exactly how many sales you need to break even, how much traffic you need to generate, and what's the maximum you can pay per click while still making a profit. This calculator helps you set realistic advertising budgets and avoid wasting money on unprofitable campaigns.
seo.formulaContent: The calculator uses several formulas: Profit Per Sale = Selling Price - Product Cost. Break-Even Sales = Ad Spend ÷ Profit Per Sale. Required Traffic = Break-Even Sales ÷ (Conversion Rate ÷ 100). Maximum CPC = Profit Per Sale × (Conversion Rate ÷ 100). For example, if your product sells for $50, costs $30, you plan to spend $500 on ads, and expect a 2% conversion rate: Profit Per Sale = $20, Break-Even Sales = 25 units, Required Traffic = 1,250 visitors, Maximum CPC = $0.40.
seo.whyNeedContent: Running ads without understanding your break-even point is like gambling with your money. Many businesses lose money on advertising because they don't calculate these metrics beforehand. This tool helps you: determine if your product margins can support paid advertising, set realistic ad budgets based on your profit margins, know the maximum CPC you can afford while staying profitable, calculate how much traffic you need to generate to break even, and make data-driven decisions about your marketing spend.

shippingComparator.title: Shipping Cost Comparator
shippingComparator.description: Compare shipping costs between carriers with volumetric weight calculation
shippingComparator.carrierComparisonDescription: Compare shipping costs and delivery times across all carriers

seo.whatIs: What is the Shipping Cost Comparator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Shipping Cost Comparator is an essential tool for e-commerce sellers and businesses that need to ship products regularly. With multiple shipping carriers available in Saudi Arabia including Aramex, SMSA, DHL, FedEx, and Saudi Post, each with different pricing structures and delivery times, choosing the right carrier can significantly impact your costs and customer satisfaction. This tool helps you instantly compare shipping costs across all major carriers based on your package weight and dimensions.
seo.formulaContent: Shipping costs are calculated based on the chargeable weight, which is the greater of actual weight or volumetric weight. Volumetric weight is calculated as: (Length × Width × Height) / 5000 (in cm/kg). For example, a package measuring 40×30×20 cm has a volumetric weight of 4.8 kg. If the actual weight is 3 kg, the chargeable weight would be 4.8 kg. Each carrier then applies their base rate plus a per-kg rate to calculate the final cost.
seo.whyNeedContent: Shipping costs can significantly impact your profit margins and customer satisfaction. Choosing the wrong carrier can mean paying more than necessary or disappointing customers with slow delivery. This tool helps you: compare all major Saudi shipping carriers side by side, understand how volumetric weight affects your shipping costs, find the cheapest option for cost-sensitive shipments, identify the fastest option for urgent deliveries, and make informed decisions about which carriers to offer your customers.

saudiVATCalculator.title: Saudi VAT Calculator (15%)
saudiVATCalculator.description: Calculate Saudi Arabia VAT - add or extract 15% VAT from any amount
saudiVATCalculator.addVATDescription: Enter the amount before VAT to calculate the total with VAT
saudiVATCalculator.extractVATDescription: Enter the total amount with VAT to extract the original amount

seo.whatIs: What is the Saudi VAT Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Saudi VAT Calculator is an essential tool for every merchant and business operating in Saudi Arabia. Since the implementation of Value Added Tax (VAT) at 15% in 2020, businesses must accurately calculate VAT on all taxable goods and services. This calculator helps you instantly add VAT to your prices or extract the VAT amount from a total price, ensuring compliance with Saudi tax regulations and accurate pricing for your customers.
seo.formulaContent: Saudi VAT is calculated at a fixed rate of 15%. To add VAT: Total with VAT = Amount × 1.15. To extract VAT from a total: Amount before VAT = Total ÷ 1.15, and VAT Amount = Total - Amount before VAT. For example, if a product costs 100 SAR before VAT, the total with VAT is 100 × 1.15 = 115 SAR, and the VAT amount is 15 SAR. Conversely, if the total price is 115 SAR including VAT, the original amount is 115 ÷ 1.15 = 100 SAR.
seo.whyNeedContent: Accurate VAT calculation is crucial for tax compliance and proper pricing in Saudi Arabia. Incorrect VAT calculations can lead to tax penalties, pricing errors, and customer disputes. This tool helps you: quickly calculate VAT for invoices and receipts, determine the correct selling price including VAT, extract VAT amounts from total prices for accounting purposes, ensure compliance with ZATCA (Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority) regulations, and simplify your daily business operations with instant calculations.

fbaStorageCalculator.title: Amazon FBA Storage Fee Calculator
fbaStorageCalculator.description: Calculate Amazon FBA long-term storage fees including monthly fees, aged inventory surcharges, and long-term storage fees

seo.whatIs: What is the Amazon FBA Storage Fee Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Amazon FBA Storage Fee Calculator is an essential tool for every Amazon seller using Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA). Amazon charges monthly storage fees based on the cubic feet your inventory occupies in their fulfillment centers. Additionally, inventory stored for more than 6 months incurs aged inventory surcharges, and inventory stored over 12 months faces long-term storage fees. This calculator helps you estimate all these costs in advance so you can make informed decisions about inventory management and avoid unexpected fees.
seo.formula: How are FBA storage fees calculated?
seo.formulaContent: FBA storage fees are calculated based on cubic feet: Cubic Feet = (Length × Width × Height) / 1728 × Units. Monthly storage rates vary by size tier and season: Standard size is $0.87/cubic foot (Jan-Sep) and $2.40/cubic foot (Oct-Dec peak season). Oversize is $0.56/cubic foot (Jan-Sep) and $1.40/cubic foot (Oct-Dec). Aged inventory surcharge (6-12 months): $1.50/cubic foot for standard, $0.50/cubic foot for oversize. Long-term storage fee (12+ months): $6.90/cubic foot for both tiers.
seo.whyNeed: Why do Amazon sellers need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: FBA storage fees can quickly eat into your profits if not managed properly. Many sellers are surprised by aged inventory surcharges and long-term storage fees that can exceed the value of their products. This tool helps you: estimate total storage costs before sending inventory to FBA, plan inventory levels to avoid long-term storage fees, compare costs between standard and oversize products, make informed decisions about slow-moving inventory, and optimize your FBA strategy for maximum profitability.

fairPricingCalculator.title: Fair Product Pricing Calculator
fairPricingCalculator.description: Calculate the fair selling price for your products based on costs, fees, and desired profit margin
fairPricingCalculator.feeExceedsError: Error: Total fees and margin exceed 100%. Please reduce your desired margin or fees.
fairPricingCalculator.enterValidNumbers: Enter product cost, desired margin, and gateway fee

seo.whatIs: What is the Fair Product Pricing Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Fair Product Pricing Calculator is an essential tool for new e-commerce sellers who want to price their products correctly from the start. Many beginners struggle with pricing because they forget to account for all the costs involved in selling online, including payment gateway fees, platform fees, and shipping costs. This calculator helps you determine the right selling price that covers all your costs while achieving your desired profit margin, ensuring your business remains profitable.
seo.formula: How is the fair price calculated?
seo.formulaContent: The formula used is: Selling Price = (Product Cost + Shipping Cost) ÷ (1 - Profit Margin% - Gateway Fee% - Platform Fee%). For example, if your product costs $20, shipping is $5, you want a 30% profit margin, gateway fee is 2.5%, and platform fee is 15%, then: Selling Price = (20 + 5) ÷ (1 - 0.30 - 0.025 - 0.15) = 25 ÷ 0.525 = $47.62. This ensures that after all deductions, you still make your desired 30% profit.
seo.whyNeedContent: Pricing products correctly is one of the biggest challenges for new sellers. Price too low and you lose money; price too high and you lose customers. Many sellers make the mistake of simply adding a markup to their cost without considering all the fees that will be deducted from each sale. This tool helps you: calculate the exact price needed to achieve your profit goals, understand how fees impact your margins, compare pricing strategies for different sales channels, avoid the common mistake of underpricing your products, and build a sustainable and profitable business from day one.

roiCalculator.title: Business ROI Calculator
roiCalculator.description: Calculate Return on Investment (ROI), annualized ROI, and payback period for your business investments
roiCalculator.negativeROIWarning: Warning: This investment shows a negative ROI!
roiCalculator.summaryPositive: Your investment of {profit} generates a {roi} return with a payback period of {payback}.
roiCalculator.summaryNegative: This investment results in a loss of {loss}. Consider revising your business plan or reducing costs.
roiCalculator.enterValidNumbers: Enter initial investment, expected revenue, and time period

seo.whatIs: What is the Business ROI Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Business ROI Calculator is an essential tool for entrepreneurs and business owners who want to evaluate the profitability of their investments before committing capital. Return on Investment (ROI) is one of the most important metrics in business, helping you understand how much profit you can expect relative to your investment. This calculator goes beyond simple ROI by also calculating annualized ROI for comparing investments of different durations and payback period to know when you'll recover your initial investment.
seo.formulaContent: The calculator uses several formulas: Net Profit = Expected Revenue - Initial Investment - Ongoing Costs. ROI Percentage = (Net Profit ÷ Initial Investment) × 100. Annualized ROI = ROI × (12 ÷ Time Period in months). Payback Period = Initial Investment ÷ (Net Profit ÷ Time Period). For example, if you invest $10,000, expect $15,000 revenue over 12 months with $2,000 ongoing costs: Net Profit = $3,000, ROI = 30%, Annualized ROI = 30%, Payback Period = 40 months.
seo.whyNeed: Why do business owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Making investment decisions without calculating ROI is like navigating without a compass. Many businesses fail because owners don't properly evaluate investments before committing resources. This tool helps you: evaluate potential investments before committing capital, compare different investment opportunities objectively, understand how long it will take to recover your investment, identify investments that may result in losses, make data-driven decisions about where to allocate your resources, and plan your business finances with realistic expectations.

sizeConverter.title: Size Chart Converter
sizeConverter.description: Convert Chinese sizes to international sizes (US/EU/UK) for clothing and shoes
sizeConverter.measurementDescription: Enter your measurements to get a size recommendation
sizeConverter.exactMatch: Exact match based on your measurements
sizeConverter.approximateMatch: Approximate match - consider trying adjacent sizes
sizeConverter.sizeChartDescription: Full comparison table for all sizes in this category
sizeConverter.enterValidInputs: Select a size to see conversion results

seo.whatIs: What is the Size Chart Converter?
seo.whatIsContent: The Size Chart Converter is an essential tool for e-commerce merchants who import clothing and shoes from China. Chinese sizes often differ significantly from international sizing systems (US, EU, UK), leading to customer confusion and high return rates. This tool helps you instantly convert between Chinese and international sizes, and even recommends sizes based on body measurements, ensuring your customers always order the right size.
seo.formulaContent: Size conversion is based on standardized size charts that map Chinese sizes to their international equivalents. For example, a Chinese XL in men's clothing typically equals US L, EU 50, or UK 40. For shoes, Chinese size 40 equals US 7, EU 40, and UK 6. The tool also uses body measurements (chest, waist, hip for clothing; foot length for shoes) to recommend the most accurate size.
seo.whyNeedContent: Returns due to sizing issues are one of the biggest costs for e-commerce businesses. By providing accurate size conversions and measurement-based recommendations, you can: reduce return rates significantly, improve customer satisfaction, build trust with accurate product listings, save time on customer service inquiries about sizing, and increase conversion rates by helping customers choose confidently.

volumetricCalculator.title: Volumetric Weight Calculator
volumetricCalculator.description: Calculate volumetric weight and compare chargeable weight across carriers
volumetricCalculator.carrierComparisonDescription: Different carriers use different divisors for volumetric weight calculation
volumetricCalculator.volumetricHigherExplanation: You will be charged based on volumetric weight. Consider using smaller packaging to reduce costs.

seo.whatIs: What is the Volumetric Weight Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Volumetric Weight Calculator is an essential tool for e-commerce merchants and shippers who need to accurately estimate shipping costs. Shipping carriers charge based on the greater of actual weight or volumetric (dimensional) weight. This calculator helps you determine the volumetric weight of your packages and compare how different carriers calculate it, so you can optimize your packaging and avoid unexpected shipping charges.
seo.formulaContent: Volumetric weight is calculated using the formula: (Length × Width × Height) / Divisor. The divisor varies by carrier: DHL, FedEx, UPS, and SMSA use 5000, while Aramex and Saudi Post use 6000. For example, a package measuring 40×30×20 cm has a volumetric weight of (40×30×20)/5000 = 4.8 kg. If the actual weight is 3 kg, the chargeable weight would be 4.8 kg (the higher value).
seo.whyNeedContent: Understanding volumetric weight is crucial for accurate shipping cost estimation. Many merchants are surprised by higher-than-expected shipping charges because they only consider actual weight. This tool helps you: calculate the true chargeable weight before shipping, compare volumetric weight calculations across different carriers, optimize packaging to reduce volumetric weight, make informed decisions about which carrier offers the best rates, and accurately price shipping for your customers.

dimensionConverter.title: Dimension Converter
dimensionConverter.description: Convert carton dimensions between cm and inches with volume calculation
dimensionConverter.commonBoxSizesDescription: Standard shipping box dimensions for reference
dimensionConverter.enterValidInputs: Enter valid dimensions for all boxes

seo.whatIs: What is the Dimension Converter?
seo.whatIsContent: The Dimension Converter is an essential tool for e-commerce merchants who work with international suppliers and shipping companies. Different countries and platforms use different measurement systems - China and most of Asia use centimeters, while the US uses inches. This tool helps you instantly convert carton and package dimensions between these systems, calculate volumes, and find the right box size for your products.
seo.formulaContent: Dimension conversion uses the standard formula: 1 inch = 2.54 cm (or 1 cm = 0.3937 inch). For volume, the formula is Length × Width × Height. For example, a box measuring 40×30×20 cm equals 15.75×11.81×7.87 inches. The volume would be 24,000 cm³ or 1,464.5 in³. The tool also recommends standard box sizes based on your dimensions.
seo.whyNeedContent: Working with international suppliers often means dealing with different measurement systems. Incorrect dimension conversions can lead to: ordering wrong-sized packaging, inaccurate shipping cost estimates, products not fitting in expected boxes, and confusion when communicating with suppliers. This tool helps you: convert dimensions instantly and accurately, calculate volumes for shipping quotes, find the right standard box size, and batch convert multiple boxes at once for large orders.

lastMileCalculator.title: Last Mile Cost Calculator
lastMileCalculator.description: Calculate last mile delivery costs and compare Saudi delivery providers

seo.whatIs: What is the Last Mile Cost Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Last Mile Cost Calculator helps e-commerce sellers estimate and compare the cost of delivering products from their warehouse or fulfillment center to the customer's doorstep. Last mile delivery is often the most expensive part of the shipping process, accounting for up to 53% of total shipping costs. This tool helps you understand these costs across different Saudi delivery providers like SMSA, Aramex, Fetchr, and others, so you can make informed decisions about your delivery strategy.
seo.formula: How is last mile cost calculated?
seo.formulaContent: Last mile costs are calculated based on several factors: Base delivery fee + Weight surcharge (if applicable) + Zone surcharge (based on delivery area) + COD fee (for cash on delivery orders). For example, a 2kg package delivered within Riyadh might cost: Base fee (15 SAR) + Weight surcharge (0 SAR for under 5kg) + Zone surcharge (0 SAR for same city) = 15 SAR. COD orders typically add 5-10 SAR or 1-2% of order value.
seo.whyNeedContent: Delivery costs directly impact your pricing strategy and profit margins. Many sellers either absorb too much delivery cost or charge customers too much, losing sales. This calculator helps you: compare rates between Saudi delivery providers, decide whether to offer free shipping or charge customers, calculate the true cost of COD orders, set minimum order values for free shipping, and negotiate better rates with delivery companies by understanding market prices.

weightConverter.title: Weight Converter
weightConverter.description: Convert product weights between grams, ounces, pounds, and kilograms
weightConverter.enterValidWeight: Enter a valid weight greater than zero

seo.whatIs: What is the Weight Converter?
seo.whatIsContent: The Weight Converter is a free tool that helps you convert weights between different units: grams, ounces, pounds, and kilograms. This tool is essential for merchants dealing with international suppliers using different measurement units, or when entering product data into e-commerce platforms that require specific units.
seo.howItWorksContent: The conversion is based on fixed formulas: 1 ounce = 28.3495 grams, 1 pound = 453.592 grams (or 16 ounces), 1 kilogram = 1000 grams. The tool automatically calculates all conversions and displays them with up to 3 decimal places for small products.
seo.whyNeedContent: Knowing the exact weight in different units is vital for several reasons: calculating shipping costs accurately, comparing supplier prices using different units, entering product data on Amazon or eBay, and determining the shipping category (light/medium/heavy) that affects cost. The tool also provides a reference for common product weights for comparison.

leadTimeTracker.title: Lead Time Tracker
leadTimeTracker.description: Calculate total delivery time from supplier to customer with timeline breakdown
leadTimeTracker.processingDaysHint: Time needed by supplier to prepare the order

seo.whatIs: What is the Lead Time Tracker?
seo.whatIsContent: The Lead Time Tracker is an essential tool for e-commerce merchants who import products from overseas. Knowing the actual delivery time from supplier to warehouse is vital for proper inventory planning and managing customer expectations. This tool calculates total delivery time with a breakdown of each stage: supplier processing, shipping, customs clearance, with peak season considerations.
seo.formulaContent: Total delivery time is calculated by summing all stages: supplier processing time + shipping transit + customs clearance + peak season buffer (if applicable). For example, a shipment from China by sea: supplier processing 7 days + sea freight 30 days + customs clearance 5 days = 42 days. During peak season, add 7 buffer days for a total of 49 days.
seo.whyNeedContent: Accurate delivery time planning is essential for any import-based business. Without knowing actual delivery times, you may face: stockouts and lost sales, delays in fulfilling customer orders, extra costs for emergency express shipping. This tool helps you: plan inventory orders in advance, manage customer expectations accurately, avoid surprise delays during peak season, and choose the right shipping method for your needs.

cbmCalculator.title: CBM Calculator
cbmCalculator.description: Calculate container capacity and carton utilization for sea freight shipping
cbmCalculator.enterValidInputs: Enter valid dimensions and quantity for at least one carton

seo.whatIs: What is the CBM Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The CBM (Cubic Meter) Calculator is an essential tool for importers who ship goods in sea freight containers. Knowing your container utilization is vital for optimizing shipping costs and avoiding paying for empty space or ordering a container that's too small. This tool calculates the total volume of your cartons and the utilization percentage of your chosen container.
seo.formulaContent: Volume in cubic meters (CBM) is calculated using the formula: (Length × Width × Height) / 1,000,000 (in centimeters). For example, a carton measuring 60×40×40 cm has a volume of 0.096 CBM. If you have 100 cartons, the total volume is 9.6 CBM. A 20ft container holds 33 CBM, so utilization = 9.6/33 = 29%.
seo.whyNeedContent: Choosing the right container size directly affects shipping costs. A container that's too large means paying for empty space, and one that's too small means needing an additional container. This tool helps you: calculate the exact volume of your shipment, choose the right container size (20ft, 40ft, 40ft High Cube), know utilization percentage to optimize costs, and easily plan multi-carton shipments.

webpConverter.title: WebP Converter
webpConverter.description: Convert product images to WebP format for faster loading
webpConverter.uploadDescription: Drag and drop images or click to browse
webpConverter.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP

seo.whatIs: What is the WebP Converter?
seo.whatIsContent: The WebP Converter transforms your product images into WebP format, a modern image format developed by Google that provides superior compression. WebP images are significantly smaller than JPEG and PNG files while maintaining the same visual quality. For e-commerce stores, this means faster page load times, better user experience, improved SEO rankings, and reduced bandwidth costs. Google explicitly recommends WebP for web images, and all modern browsers now support it.
seo.formulaContent: WebP uses both lossy and lossless compression algorithms. For lossy compression, it uses predictive coding to encode an image, analyzing neighboring pixel blocks to predict values. The difference between prediction and actual values is then encoded. For lossless compression, it uses techniques like transform coding, spatial prediction, color space conversion, and entropy coding. WebP typically achieves 25-34% smaller file sizes than JPEG at equivalent quality, and 26% smaller than PNG for lossless images.
seo.whyNeedContent: Page speed directly impacts your conversion rate - studies show that a 1-second delay in page load can reduce conversions by 7%. Product images are often the largest files on e-commerce pages. By converting to WebP, you can: reduce image file sizes by 25-35% without visible quality loss, improve page load speed significantly, boost your Google PageSpeed score, reduce hosting bandwidth costs, improve mobile shopping experience, and gain SEO advantages as Google favors fast-loading sites.

imageCompressor.title: Smart Image Compressor
imageCompressor.description: Compress images intelligently while maintaining quality
imageCompressor.uploadDescription: Drag and drop images or click to browse
imageCompressor.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP
imageCompressor.qualityWarning: Warning: Quality is very low. Image may appear degraded.
imageCompressor.tooSmall: File may be too small - quality could be affected
imageCompressor.tooLarge: File is larger than recommended - consider more compression

seo.whatIs: What is the Smart Image Compressor?
seo.whatIsContent: The Smart Image Compressor intelligently reduces the file size of your product images while maintaining visual quality. Unlike basic compression tools that apply the same settings to all images, our smart compressor analyzes each image individually to determine the optimal compression level. This ensures your product photos look crisp and professional while loading quickly. The tool supports JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats, making it versatile for all your e-commerce image needs.
seo.formulaContent: Image compression uses algorithms to reduce file size while preserving visual quality. Lossy compression removes data that human eyes can't easily perceive, using techniques like chroma subsampling (reducing color information) and quantization (reducing precision of color values). The compression ratio depends on quality settings - at 80% quality, you typically achieve 60-70% file size reduction with minimal visible difference. Smart compression analyzes each image to find the optimal balance between size and quality.
seo.whyNeedContent: Large image files are the #1 cause of slow e-commerce websites. Slow sites lead to higher bounce rates, lower conversions, and poor SEO rankings. This compressor helps you: reduce image sizes by 50-80% without noticeable quality loss, improve page load speed dramatically, enhance mobile shopping experience, reduce hosting storage and bandwidth costs, improve Google Core Web Vitals scores, and maintain professional-looking product images that convert browsers into buyers.

socialResizer.title: Social Media Resizer
socialResizer.description: Resize images for Instagram, Snapchat, and Twitter with preset dimensions
socialResizer.uploadDescription: Drag and drop images here or click to browse
socialResizer.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP
socialResizer.selectPlatformsDescription: Choose the social media platforms you want to resize for
socialResizer.cropPositionDescription: Choose how to crop the image when resizing
socialResizer.noPlatformsSelected: Please select at least one platform

seo.whatIs: What is the Social Media Resizer?
seo.whatIsContent: The Social Media Resizer automatically adjusts your product images to the perfect dimensions for Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter, and other social platforms. Each social network has specific image size requirements, and using incorrectly sized images results in awkward cropping, blurry photos, or wasted screen space. This tool ensures your product photos look professional and eye-catching on every platform, maximizing engagement and click-through rates.
seo.formula: What are the optimal social media dimensions?
seo.formulaContent: Each platform has specific optimal dimensions: Instagram Post: 1080x1080px (square), 1080x1350px (portrait), 1080x566px (landscape). Instagram Story/Reels: 1080x1920px (9:16 ratio). Snapchat: 1080x1920px (9:16 ratio). Twitter/X Post: 1200x675px (16:9 ratio), Profile: 400x400px. TikTok: 1080x1920px (9:16 ratio). The tool automatically crops and resizes your images to these exact dimensions while maintaining the focal point of your product.
seo.whyNeedContent: Social media is essential for e-commerce marketing, but each platform has different image requirements. Manually resizing images for each platform is time-consuming and error-prone. This tool helps you: instantly resize images for all major social platforms, maintain image quality during resizing, ensure your products look professional everywhere, save hours of manual image editing, increase engagement with properly sized images, and create consistent branding across all social channels.

colorExtractor.title: Brand Color Extractor
colorExtractor.description: Extract dominant colors from images for brand consistency
colorExtractor.uploadDescription: Drag and drop an image or click to browse
colorExtractor.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP

seo.whatIs: What is the Brand Color Extractor?
seo.whatIsContent: The Brand Color Extractor analyzes your product images or logo to identify the dominant colors and create a cohesive brand color palette. Consistent branding across your store, social media, and marketing materials builds trust and recognition. This tool automatically extracts the main colors from any image and provides them in various formats (HEX, RGB, HSL) ready to use in your website design, social media graphics, and marketing materials.
seo.formulaContent: Color extraction uses algorithms to analyze pixel data and identify dominant colors. The process involves: 1) Sampling pixels from the image, 2) Grouping similar colors using clustering algorithms (like k-means), 3) Calculating the frequency of each color cluster, 4) Ranking colors by dominance. The tool returns colors in multiple formats: HEX (#FF5733), RGB (255, 87, 51), and HSL (11, 100%, 60%). It also calculates color harmony and suggests complementary colors for your brand palette.
seo.whyNeedContent: Brand consistency is crucial for building customer trust and recognition. Many small businesses struggle to maintain consistent colors across their online presence. This tool helps you: extract exact colors from your logo or products, create a professional brand color palette, ensure color consistency across all platforms, get colors in formats ready for web design (HEX) and print (RGB), discover complementary colors for your brand, and build a more professional and trustworthy brand image.

watermarkCreator.title: Watermark Creator
watermarkCreator.description: Add transparent watermarks to protect your product images
watermarkCreator.uploadDescription: Drag and drop images or click to browse
watermarkCreator.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP

seo.whatIs: What is the Watermark Creator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Watermark Creator adds your logo or custom text as a transparent watermark to your product images. This protects your photos from being stolen and used by competitors while also promoting your brand. You can customize the watermark position, size, opacity, and style to match your brand aesthetic. The tool supports both image watermarks (your logo) and text watermarks, and can process multiple images at once for efficiency.
seo.formulaContent: Watermarking overlays a semi-transparent image or text onto your product photos. The process involves: 1) Loading your watermark (logo or text), 2) Setting opacity level (typically 30-50% for visibility without distraction), 3) Positioning the watermark (corner, center, or tiled), 4) Blending the watermark with the original image using alpha compositing. The formula for alpha blending is: Output = (Watermark × Alpha) + (Original × (1 - Alpha)). This creates a visible but non-intrusive mark that protects your images.
seo.whyNeedContent: Product image theft is rampant in e-commerce. Competitors often steal high-quality product photos to use on their own listings. Watermarking protects your investment in product photography while also serving as free advertising. This tool helps you: protect your product images from theft, add professional branding to all your photos, deter competitors from using your images, maintain brand visibility even when images are shared, process multiple images quickly with consistent watermarks, and create a more professional store appearance.

faviconGenerator.title: Favicon Generator
faviconGenerator.description: Convert your logo to favicon in all required sizes
faviconGenerator.uploadDescription: Drag and drop your logo or click to browse
faviconGenerator.supportedFormats: Supports PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP, SVG
faviconGenerator.recommendedSize: Recommended: Square image, at least 512×512 pixels
faviconGenerator.browserPreviewHint: This is how your favicon will appear in browser tabs

seo.whatIs: What is the Favicon Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Favicon Generator converts your logo or brand image into all the favicon sizes needed for modern websites. A favicon is the small icon that appears in browser tabs, bookmarks, and mobile home screens. Having a proper favicon makes your store look professional and helps customers recognize your site among their open tabs. This tool generates all required sizes from a single image, including special formats for iOS, Android, and Windows.
seo.formulaContent: Modern websites need multiple favicon sizes for different devices and contexts: 16x16px (browser tabs), 32x32px (taskbar shortcuts), 48x48px (Windows site icons), 180x180px (Apple Touch Icon for iOS), 192x192px (Android Chrome), 512x512px (PWA splash screens). The tool also generates favicon.ico (multi-resolution icon file containing 16x16, 32x32, and 48x48), apple-touch-icon.png, and manifest icons for Progressive Web Apps. All sizes are generated from a single source image.
seo.whyNeedContent: A missing or generic favicon makes your store look unprofessional and harder to find among browser tabs. Many customers judge a store's credibility by small details like this. This tool helps you: create all required favicon sizes from one image, look professional across all browsers and devices, improve brand recognition in browser tabs, support iOS home screen icons for mobile shoppers, enable PWA (Progressive Web App) functionality, and build trust with attention to professional details.

bulkImageTool.title: Bulk Image Flip & Rotate
bulkImageTool.description: Flip and rotate multiple images at once for consistent product photos
bulkImageTool.uploadDescription: Drag and drop images or click to browse
bulkImageTool.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP

seo.whatIs: What is the Bulk Image Flip & Rotate tool?
seo.whatIsContent: The Bulk Image Flip & Rotate tool allows you to transform multiple product images at once with consistent operations. Whether you need to flip images horizontally for mirror effects, rotate product photos to the correct orientation, or create variations of your images, this tool processes them all in one batch. It's essential for maintaining consistency across your product catalog and fixing common issues like incorrectly oriented photos from suppliers.
seo.formulaContent: Image transformations use matrix operations to manipulate pixel positions. Horizontal flip mirrors the image along the Y-axis by reversing pixel columns: newX = width - oldX. Vertical flip mirrors along the X-axis: newY = height - oldY. Rotation uses trigonometric functions: newX = x×cos(θ) - y×sin(θ), newY = x×sin(θ) + y×cos(θ). For 90° rotation, this simplifies to swapping coordinates. These operations preserve image quality as they only reposition pixels without resampling.
seo.whyNeedContent: Product images often come from various sources with inconsistent orientations. Manually rotating or flipping each image is tedious and time-consuming. This tool helps you: fix incorrectly oriented product photos in bulk, create mirror versions of images for design purposes, maintain consistent image orientation across your catalog, save hours of manual image editing, process supplier images quickly for your store, and ensure professional-looking product listings with properly oriented photos.

whatsappLinkGenerator.title: WhatsApp Order Link Generator
whatsappLinkGenerator.description: Generate WhatsApp links with pre-filled order messages for easy customer contact
whatsappLinkGenerator.enterRequiredFields: Please enter phone number and product name
whatsappLinkGenerator.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

seo.whatIs: What is the WhatsApp Order Link Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The WhatsApp Order Link Generator creates clickable links that open WhatsApp with your number and a pre-filled order message. This is essential for Saudi and Gulf e-commerce where WhatsApp is the primary communication channel. Instead of customers manually typing your number and product details, they simply click a link and the message is ready to send. This dramatically reduces friction in the ordering process and increases conversion rates.
seo.formulaContent: WhatsApp links use the wa.me URL scheme: https://wa.me/[phone]?text=[message]. The phone number must be in international format without + or spaces (e.g., 966501234567 for Saudi). The message is URL-encoded to handle special characters. For example: https://wa.me/966501234567?text=Hi%2C%20I%20want%20to%20order%20Product%20X. When clicked, this opens WhatsApp with the number and pre-filled message, allowing one-tap ordering for customers.
seo.whyNeedContent: In Saudi Arabia and the Gulf, WhatsApp is the dominant platform for business communication. Many customers prefer ordering via WhatsApp over traditional checkout. This tool helps you: create one-click ordering links for your products, reduce friction in the customer journey, increase conversion rates with easier ordering, pre-fill product details to avoid confusion, track which products generate inquiries, and provide a familiar ordering experience for Gulf customers.

utmBuilder.title: TikTok/Snapchat UTM Builder
utmBuilder.description: Build UTM-tagged URLs for tracking TikTok and Snapchat campaign performance
utmBuilder.missingRequired: Please fill in all required fields

seo.whatIs: What is the TikTok/Snapchat UTM Builder?
seo.whatIsContent: The UTM Builder creates tracking URLs specifically optimized for TikTok and Snapchat campaigns. UTM parameters allow you to track exactly which social media posts, ads, or influencers are driving traffic and sales to your store. Without UTM tracking, you can't measure the ROI of your social media marketing. This tool makes it easy to create properly formatted tracking URLs with pre-configured settings for TikTok and Snapchat campaigns.
seo.formulaContent: UTM (Urchin Tracking Module) parameters are tags added to URLs that Google Analytics reads to track traffic sources. The five parameters are: utm_source (traffic source, e.g., tiktok), utm_medium (marketing medium, e.g., social), utm_campaign (campaign name, e.g., summer_sale), utm_term (paid keywords), utm_content (ad variation). Example: https://store.com?utm_source=tiktok&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=summer_sale. When users click this link, Analytics records where they came from, allowing you to measure campaign ROI.
seo.whyNeedContent: TikTok and Snapchat are major marketing channels for e-commerce, but measuring their effectiveness is challenging without proper tracking. This tool helps you: track which TikTok videos drive the most sales, measure Snapchat ad campaign performance, compare ROI across different influencers, identify your best-performing content, make data-driven decisions about ad spend, and prove the value of your social media marketing efforts.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator with Logo
qrCodeGenerator.description: Generate professional QR codes with your store logo for marketing materials
qrCodeGenerator.contentPlaceholder: Enter URL or text to encode
qrCodeGenerator.logoWarning: Logo may affect scannability. Test before printing.

seo.whatIs: What is the QR Code Generator with Logo?
seo.whatIsContent: The QR Code Generator creates professional QR codes with your store logo embedded in the center. QR codes are essential for bridging offline and online marketing - customers can scan them on product packaging, business cards, flyers, or store displays to instantly visit your website or product page. Adding your logo makes the QR code branded and more trustworthy, increasing scan rates compared to generic black-and-white codes.
seo.formulaContent: QR (Quick Response) codes encode data in a 2D matrix of black and white squares. The code consists of: finder patterns (large squares in corners for orientation), timing patterns (alternating squares for coordinate system), format information (error correction level), and data modules (the actual encoded information). QR codes use Reed-Solomon error correction, allowing them to be read even when partially damaged. A standard QR code can store up to 3KB of data, enough for URLs, contact info, or short messages.
seo.whyNeedContent: QR codes connect your physical marketing materials to your online store. They're increasingly popular in Saudi Arabia for contactless interactions. This tool helps you: create branded QR codes with your logo, link physical products to online reviews or instructions, add QR codes to packaging for reorder links, create scannable business cards and flyers, track offline marketing effectiveness, and provide a modern, tech-savvy brand image.

linkShortener.title: Influencer Link Shortener
linkShortener.description: Create shortened affiliate links for influencers to track referral performance
linkShortener.aliasUnavailable: This alias is already taken. Try another.

seo.whatIs: What is the Influencer Link Shortener?
seo.whatIsContent: The Influencer Link Shortener creates short, trackable affiliate links specifically designed for influencer marketing campaigns. Long URLs with UTM parameters look unprofessional and are hard to share verbally or in social media bios. This tool creates clean, branded short links that redirect to your full tracking URL while providing click analytics. You can see exactly how many clicks each influencer generates and track their performance over time.
seo.formulaContent: Link shorteners create a redirect from a short URL to your original long URL. When someone clicks the short link, the server looks up the original URL in a database and redirects the user (HTTP 301 or 302 redirect). The short URL typically uses a unique identifier (e.g., abc123) that maps to the full URL. This process also allows tracking: the server can log the click time, referrer, device type, and location before redirecting, providing valuable analytics data.
seo.whyNeedContent: Influencer marketing is huge in Saudi e-commerce, but tracking ROI is challenging. Long affiliate links look spammy and reduce click rates. This tool helps you: create professional short links for influencers, track clicks and conversions per influencer, compare performance across different influencers, provide influencers with easy-to-share links, measure the true ROI of influencer partnerships, and make data-driven decisions about influencer collaborations.

contactLinkGenerator.title: Quick Contact Link Generator
contactLinkGenerator.description: Generate direct contact links for WhatsApp, Telegram, Email, Phone, and SMS
contactLinkGenerator.subject: Email Subject (Optional)

seo.whatIs: What is the Quick Contact Link Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Quick Contact Link Generator creates one-click contact links for WhatsApp, Telegram, Email, Phone, and SMS. Instead of displaying your contact information and hoping customers will manually reach out, these links let customers contact you with a single tap. This dramatically reduces friction and increases the likelihood of customer inquiries. The tool generates properly formatted links that work across all devices and platforms.
seo.formulaContent: Contact links use platform-specific URL schemes: WhatsApp: https://wa.me/[phone]?text=[message]. Telegram: https://t.me/[username] or tg://resolve?domain=[username]. Email: mailto:[email]?subject=[subject]&body=[body]. Phone: tel:[phone]. SMS: sms:[phone]?body=[message]. These schemes are recognized by browsers and mobile devices, which open the appropriate app when clicked. The tool URL-encodes special characters to ensure links work correctly across all platforms.
seo.whyNeedContent: Every extra step in contacting you is a potential lost customer. Many shoppers abandon their inquiry if they have to manually copy a phone number or email address. This tool helps you: create instant-contact links for all platforms, reduce friction in customer communication, increase inquiry and conversion rates, provide multiple contact options for customer preference, ensure links work correctly on all devices, and make your store more accessible and customer-friendly.

conversionRateCalculator.title: Conversion Rate Calculator
conversionRateCalculator.description: Calculate your store's conversion rate and compare with industry benchmarks

seo.whatIs: What is the Conversion Rate Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Conversion Rate Calculator helps you measure and benchmark your store's performance by calculating what percentage of visitors make a purchase. Conversion rate is one of the most important metrics in e-commerce - it tells you how effectively your store turns browsers into buyers. This tool not only calculates your rate but also compares it against industry benchmarks so you know if you're performing above or below average for your category.
seo.formulaContent: Conversion Rate = (Number of Conversions ÷ Total Visitors) × 100. For example, if your store had 5,000 visitors and 150 purchases, your conversion rate is (150 ÷ 5,000) × 100 = 3%. Industry benchmarks vary: general e-commerce averages 2-3%, fashion 1.5-2.5%, electronics 1-2%, luxury goods 0.5-1%. A 'good' conversion rate depends on your industry, traffic source, and price point. Paid traffic typically converts higher than organic traffic.
seo.whyNeedContent: You can't improve what you don't measure. Many store owners focus only on traffic without understanding how well that traffic converts. This tool helps you: calculate your exact conversion rate, compare against industry benchmarks, identify if you have a traffic problem or conversion problem, set realistic improvement goals, measure the impact of store changes, and make data-driven decisions about where to invest your optimization efforts.

ltvCalculator.title: Customer Lifetime Value Calculator
ltvCalculator.description: Calculate customer lifetime value (LTV) and LTV:CAC ratio for business decisions
ltvCalculator.ltvWarning: Warning: LTV is less than CAC. This business model is unsustainable.

seo.whatIs: What is the LTV Calculator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Customer Lifetime Value (LTV) Calculator helps store owners understand how much revenue they can expect from a customer over their entire relationship. This metric is crucial for making informed decisions about customer acquisition costs, marketing budgets, and business strategy.
seo.formulaContent: LTV = Average Order Value × Purchase Frequency × Customer Lifespan. For example, if customers spend $50 per order, buy 4 times per year, and remain customers for 3 years: LTV = $50 × 4 × 3 = $600. The LTV:CAC ratio compares this to your customer acquisition cost. A healthy ratio is 3:1 or higher.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Knowing your LTV helps you make smart business decisions. If your LTV is $600, you know you can afford to spend up to $200 to acquire a customer (for a 3:1 ratio). This tool helps you: determine maximum customer acquisition cost, evaluate marketing channel profitability, identify opportunities to increase customer value, make data-driven budget decisions, and build a sustainable business model.

refundPolicyGenerator.title: Refund & Return Policy Generator
refundPolicyGenerator.description: Generate legally compliant refund and return policies for Saudi e-commerce

seo.whatIs: What is the Refund Policy Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Refund Policy Generator creates professional, legally compliant return and refund policies for Saudi e-commerce stores. A clear refund policy builds customer trust and protects your business. This tool generates policies that comply with Saudi consumer protection regulations.
seo.formulaContent: The tool uses templates based on Saudi e-commerce regulations and best practices. You select your return window, conditions, and refund method, and the tool generates a complete policy document. The policy includes sections for: eligibility, return process, refund timeline, exceptions, and contact information.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: A clear refund policy is required by Saudi e-commerce regulations and builds customer trust. This tool helps you: comply with Saudi consumer protection laws, reduce customer service inquiries, set clear expectations for customers, protect your business from disputes, and present a professional image to customers.

termsGenerator.title: Terms of Service Generator
termsGenerator.description: Generate terms of service documents for your e-commerce store

seo.whatIs: What is the Terms of Service Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Terms of Service Generator creates comprehensive legal agreements for your e-commerce store. Terms of service establish the rules and guidelines for using your website and purchasing from your store. This tool generates Arabic terms that cover essential e-commerce clauses.
seo.formulaContent: The tool combines standard e-commerce clauses with your store information to create a complete terms document. You select which clauses to include (payment, delivery, liability, etc.) and can add custom terms. The generated document uses proper Arabic legal terminology.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Terms of service protect your business legally and set clear expectations with customers. This tool helps you: establish legal agreements with customers, limit your liability for issues, protect your intellectual property, comply with e-commerce regulations, and present a professional, trustworthy image.

descriptionCleaner.title: Product Description Cleaner
descriptionCleaner.description: Clean product descriptions from unwanted symbols and formatting

seo.whatIs: What is the Description Cleaner?
seo.whatIsContent: The Product Description Cleaner removes unwanted symbols, emojis, and formatting from product descriptions. When copying descriptions from suppliers or other sources, they often contain messy formatting that looks unprofessional. This tool cleans up text while preserving essential formatting like line breaks and bullet points.
seo.formulaContent: The tool uses pattern matching to identify and remove unwanted elements. You can selectively choose what to remove: emojis, special characters, extra spaces, URLs. You can also choose what to preserve: line breaks for paragraph structure, bullet points for lists. The tool shows a before/after comparison so you can verify the results.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Professional product descriptions improve customer trust and conversions. Messy formatting with random symbols and emojis looks unprofessional. This tool helps you: quickly clean supplier descriptions, maintain consistent formatting across products, remove distracting elements, preserve important structure, and present products professionally.

seoTitleValidator.title: SEO Product Title Validator
seoTitleValidator.description: Validate product titles for SEO best practices and Google compliance

seo.whatIs: What is the SEO Title Validator?
seo.whatIsContent: The SEO Title Validator analyzes your product titles against SEO best practices to help them rank better on Google. Product titles are one of the most important factors for search visibility. This tool checks length, keyword usage, and common issues that can hurt your rankings.
seo.formulaContent: The tool analyzes titles against multiple criteria: Length (optimal is 50-60 characters for Google display), keyword stuffing detection (repeated words), special character usage, capitalization patterns, and readability. Each issue affects the overall score, and specific suggestions are provided for improvement.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Well-optimized product titles can significantly improve your search rankings and click-through rates. This tool helps you: ensure titles display fully in Google results, avoid keyword stuffing penalties, identify improvement opportunities, maintain consistent title quality, and increase organic traffic to your products.

faqGenerator.title: FAQ Schema & Text Generator
faqGenerator.description: Generate FAQ content with JSON-LD schema markup for Google rich snippets
faqGenerator.question: Question

seo.whatIs: What is the FAQ Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The FAQ Generator creates formatted FAQ content along with JSON-LD schema markup that enables Google rich snippets. When your FAQ schema is properly implemented, Google may display your questions and answers directly in search results, increasing visibility and click-through rates.
seo.formulaContent: You enter your questions and answers, and the tool generates both formatted text for your website and JSON-LD schema markup. The schema follows Google's FAQPage specification. You can use pre-built templates for common e-commerce topics or create custom FAQs. The tool validates the schema to ensure it meets Google's requirements.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: FAQ rich snippets can dramatically increase your search visibility. When Google displays your FAQs in search results, you get more real estate and higher click-through rates. This tool helps you: create SEO-optimized FAQ content, generate valid schema markup, use proven FAQ templates, increase search result visibility, and answer common customer questions proactively.

wordCounter.title: Word Counter for Product Descriptions
wordCounter.description: Count words, characters, and reading time with SEO recommendations

seo.whatIs: What is the Word Counter?
seo.whatIsContent: The Word Counter analyzes your product descriptions to ensure they meet SEO best practices for length. Search engines prefer descriptions with sufficient content to understand the product, but not so long that they become unfocused. This tool counts words, characters, and provides SEO recommendations.
seo.formulaContent: The tool counts words by splitting text on whitespace (with special handling for Arabic text), characters including and excluding spaces, sentences by punctuation marks, and paragraphs by line breaks. Reading time is estimated at 200 words per minute. SEO status is based on recommended description lengths: under 100 words is too short, 100-300 is optimal, over 300 may be too long.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Product description length affects both SEO and customer experience. Too short and search engines can't understand your product; too long and customers lose interest. This tool helps you: ensure descriptions meet SEO length requirements, estimate customer reading time, maintain consistent description quality, identify descriptions that need expansion, and optimize for both search engines and customers.

contentIdeaGenerator.title: Content Idea Generator
contentIdeaGenerator.description: Get content ideas and templates for your store's social media and marketing

seo.whatIs: What is the Content Idea Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Content Idea Generator provides ready-to-use content templates and ideas for your store's social media and marketing. Instead of staring at a blank page, get inspiration and templates tailored to your store category. Ideas are organized by content type and platform for easy use.
seo.formulaContent: Select your store category and the tool generates relevant content ideas. Each idea includes a title, template text, content type (announcement, promotion, seasonal, engagement, educational), target platform (Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Snapchat), and tips for best results. Templates are designed for Arabic-speaking audiences and Gulf market preferences.
seo.whyNeed: Why do store owners need this?
seo.whyNeedContent: Consistent content creation is essential for social media success but can be time-consuming. This tool helps you: overcome writer's block with ready templates, maintain consistent posting schedules, create platform-optimized content, engage customers with varied content types, and save time on content planning.

caseConverter.title: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Convert text between uppercase, lowercase, title case, and more

seo.whatIs: What is the Case Converter?
seo.whatIsContent: The Case Converter is a text transformation tool that allows you to quickly change the capitalization of your text. Whether you need to convert text to all uppercase for headings, lowercase for consistency, title case for proper formatting, or toggle case for creative effects, this tool handles it all instantly. It supports both English and Arabic text while preserving numbers, symbols, and special characters.
seo.formulaContent: The Case Converter applies different transformation rules based on your selection: UPPERCASE converts all letters to capital letters, lowercase converts all letters to small letters, Title Case capitalizes the first letter of each word, Sentence case capitalizes only the first letter of each sentence, and tOGGLE cASE swaps uppercase letters to lowercase and vice versa. All non-alphabetic characters (numbers, punctuation, symbols) remain unchanged during conversion.
seo.whyNeedContent: Consistent text formatting is crucial for professional business communications. Store owners use the Case Converter to: format product titles consistently across their catalog, prepare text for social media posts and marketing materials, clean up customer data and imported product descriptions, create attention-grabbing headlines in uppercase, ensure proper capitalization in email templates, and maintain brand consistency across all content. This tool saves time and eliminates manual formatting errors.

duplicateRemover.title: Duplicate Line Remover
duplicateRemover.description: Remove duplicate lines from text and clean up lists

seo.whatIs: What is the Duplicate Line Remover?
seo.whatIsContent: The Duplicate Line Remover is a text processing tool that identifies and removes duplicate lines from your text, keeping only the first occurrence of each unique line. It's perfect for cleaning up lists, removing redundant data, and organizing text content. The tool supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive comparison modes, as well as optional whitespace trimming for more flexible duplicate detection.
seo.formulaContent: The tool processes your text line by line, comparing each line against previously seen lines. When case-sensitive mode is enabled, 'Hello' and 'hello' are treated as different lines. When disabled, they're considered duplicates. The trim whitespace option removes leading and trailing spaces before comparison, so '  text  ' and 'text' would be treated as duplicates. The first occurrence of each unique line is always preserved.
seo.whyNeedContent: E-commerce sellers and content managers frequently work with large lists that contain duplicates: product SKUs, email lists, keyword lists, or imported data. Manually finding and removing duplicates is time-consuming and error-prone. This tool helps you: clean up product catalogs by removing duplicate entries, deduplicate email subscriber lists before campaigns, organize keyword lists for SEO optimization, process imported data from various sources, and maintain clean inventory records. Save hours of manual work and ensure data accuracy with instant duplicate removal.

businessNameGenerator.description: Generate creative business name ideas for your store

seo.formulaContent: The generator uses a combination of proven naming patterns: prefix combinations (like 'Shop' or 'Tech'), suffix additions (like 'Hub' or 'Store'), creative modifiers (like 'ify' or 'ly'), and compound names. It analyzes your keywords and business category to select the most appropriate patterns. For example, a food business might get suggestions like 'TasteKitchen' or 'FreshBites', while a tech company might see 'SmartLabs' or 'DigitalWorks'.
seo.whatIs: What is the Business Name Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Business Name Generator is a creative tool that helps entrepreneurs and business owners brainstorm unique, memorable names for their stores and companies. By entering keywords related to your business and selecting your industry category, the tool generates at least 10 creative name suggestions using various naming patterns and combinations. It supports both English and Arabic name generation.
seo.whyNeedContent: Choosing the right business name is crucial for brand success. A good name should be memorable, easy to spell, and reflect your brand identity. This tool helps you: brainstorm dozens of name ideas in seconds, explore different naming styles and patterns, find names that work well for your specific industry, discover creative combinations you might not have thought of, and save hours of brainstorming time. Whether you're starting a new e-commerce store, opening a restaurant, or launching a tech startup, the right name can make a lasting impression on customers.

businessNameGenerator.title: Business Name Generator

colorConverter.description: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL formats

seo.formulaContent: The tool automatically detects your input format and converts it to all other formats. HEX colors use hexadecimal notation (#RRGGBB), RGB uses decimal values for Red, Green, and Blue (0-255), and HSL uses Hue (0-360°), Saturation (0-100%), and Lightness (0-100%). The conversion algorithms maintain color accuracy while handling edge cases like 3-digit HEX codes (#RGB) which expand to 6-digit (#RRGGBB).
seo.whatIs: What is the Color Code Converter?
seo.whatIsContent: The Color Code Converter is a developer and designer tool that instantly converts colors between different formats: HEX (hexadecimal), RGB (Red, Green, Blue), and HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness). Simply enter a color in any format, and the tool displays the equivalent values in all formats along with a visual preview. It supports both 3-digit and 6-digit HEX codes, with or without the # prefix.
seo.whyNeedContent: Different contexts require different color formats: CSS often uses HEX, JavaScript might need RGB values, and design tools may work with HSL. This tool helps you: quickly convert colors for different platforms and frameworks, ensure color consistency across your codebase, work with design specifications in any format, debug color-related issues by seeing all representations, and save time switching between color formats. Whether you're building a website, designing a UI, or working with brand colors, instant color conversion streamlines your workflow.

colorConverter.title: Color Code Converter

passwordGenerator.description: Generate secure, random passwords for your accounts

seo.formulaContent: The generator uses cryptographically secure random number generation to create unpredictable passwords. It builds a character pool based on your selected options (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols), then randomly selects characters to fill the desired length. To ensure all selected character types are included, it first picks at least one character from each enabled type, then fills the rest randomly and shuffles the result. Password strength is calculated based on length, character variety, and pattern detection.
seo.whatIs: What is the Password Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: The Password Generator creates strong, random passwords that are difficult to crack. You can customize the password length (8-128 characters) and choose which character types to include: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special symbols. The tool also displays a strength indicator showing how secure your generated password is, helping you create passwords that meet security requirements.
seo.whyNeedContent: Weak passwords are one of the leading causes of security breaches. Businesses need strong passwords for: employee accounts and email systems, e-commerce platforms and payment gateways, social media and marketing accounts, database and server access, and customer account systems. This tool helps you generate passwords that are: long enough to resist brute-force attacks, random enough to prevent guessing, complex enough to meet security policies, and unique for each account. Protect your business and customer data with properly generated secure passwords.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator

htmlEntityCodec.title: HTML Entity Encoder/Decoder
htmlEntityCodec.description: Encode and decode HTML entities for safe text handling

seo.whatIs: What is HTML Entity Encoder/Decoder?
seo.whatIsContent: HTML Entity Encoder/Decoder is a tool that converts special characters to their HTML entity equivalents and vice versa. This ensures that characters like <, >, &, and quotes are safely displayed in web pages without being interpreted as HTML code.
seo.formulaContent: The encoder replaces special characters with their HTML entity codes (e.g., < becomes <). The decoder reverses this process, converting entities back to their original characters. It handles both named entities (like &) and numeric entities (like <).
seo.whyNeedContent: E-commerce sellers need this tool to safely display product descriptions containing special characters, prevent XSS vulnerabilities in user-generated content, and ensure proper rendering of HTML in emails and web pages.

robotsValidator.description: Validate your robots.txt file for syntax errors and best practices

seo.formulaContent: The validator parses your robots.txt content line by line, checking for valid directives (User-agent, Disallow, Allow, Sitemap), proper syntax, and common mistakes. It identifies errors, warnings, and provides suggestions for improvement.
seo.whatIs: What is Robots.txt Validator?
seo.whatIsContent: Robots.txt Validator is a tool that checks your robots.txt file for syntax errors, invalid directives, and best practices. It helps ensure search engine crawlers can properly read and follow your crawling instructions.
seo.whyNeedContent: E-commerce sellers need this tool to ensure their robots.txt file is correctly configured, preventing accidental blocking of important pages from search engines, and optimizing their site's crawlability for better SEO performance.

robotsValidator.title: Robots.txt Validator

sitemapGenerator.description: Generate valid XML sitemaps for better search engine indexing
sitemapGenerator.maxUrls: Maximum 100 URLs per sitemap. For larger sites, create multiple sitemaps.

seo.formulaContent: The generator takes your list of URLs and creates a properly formatted XML sitemap following the sitemaps.org protocol. It includes optional elements like priority, change frequency, and last modification date to help search engines understand your site structure.
seo.whatIs: What is XML Sitemap Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: XML Sitemap Generator creates valid XML sitemaps that help search engines discover and index your website pages. A sitemap lists all important URLs on your site along with metadata about each page.
seo.whyNeedContent: E-commerce sellers need sitemaps to ensure all product pages, categories, and important content are discovered by search engines. This improves SEO, helps new pages get indexed faster, and ensures no important pages are missed.

sitemapGenerator.title: XML Sitemap Generator

responseChecker.description: Check website response time and accessibility

seo.formulaContent: The tool sends a request to the specified URL and measures how long it takes to receive a response. It categorizes the response time as fast (<500ms), moderate (500-2000ms), or slow (>2000ms), and checks if the site is accessible.
seo.whatIs: What is Response Checker?
seo.whatIsContent: Response Checker is a tool that tests how quickly a website responds to requests. It measures the response time in milliseconds and determines if the site is accessible, helping you monitor your website's performance.
seo.whyNeedContent: E-commerce sellers need this tool to monitor their store's performance, ensure fast loading times for better customer experience, and quickly identify when their site is slow or down, which directly impacts sales and SEO rankings.

responseChecker.slowRecommendation: Your site is responding slowly. Consider:

realNetProfitCalculator.description: Calculate your true profit after all expenses including ad spend, shipping, and returns
